ygData.subject: Re: The power of being charming...
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh charm is two fold to it s also powerful to npcs. I was camping in sage room on my level 50 necro and my pet was duel wielding some 19 and 20 dly daggers.
ygData.messageBody:
Heh charm is two fold to it's also powerful to npcs. I was camping in sage
room on my level 50 necro and my pet was duel wielding some 19 and 20 dly
daggers. Out pops the scribe and gets a charm on my pet. That was scary he
beat the crap out of me and then there was a level 49 pet runing around in
guk. The thing with pets is once charmed always charmed. Was pretty funny
even though I died.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Peter Hollmer <phollmer@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, January 05, 2000 4:39 PM
Subject: [eqbards] The power of being charming...


>Just wondering if I could have done this better....
>
>Saturday night in Najena, while waiting for my party
>to come back (long story, we died and I was bound
>close.) I wanted to stop by and see if Najena was
>camped. Being the nutcase that I am, I hit lullaby,
>(my magic AE door opener.) and find a full spawn.
>Well, I could fight, or I could die, so I decided to
>play. I charm magician #1 and sicc her on Najena,
>while I twist guardian. All the mobs aggro on her
>(including her own pet) she dies quick. One pulse of
>charm and the pet suicides. Charm mage #2, sicc her on
>Najena too. She dies, of course, and I charm the pet.
>
>Najena was tougher. I was going to fear/chain her, but
>it didn't work too well. I ended up meleeing her,
>while pixie'ing like mad. She got 2 spells off.
>
>All said and done, I nearly died. I was somewhere
>around 1 bubble after all this fun, and not willing to
>chance it again. (Damn froglok ghoul almost killed me
>on the way out.) Any advice on how to do this better
>next time?
>
>
>
>Double Entendre
>Bard of 29 "Sorry, no clarity yet"'s
>
